title: Gab and Juls: Will UCL exit change Juventus' philosophy?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Juventus' exit from the Champions League and ask whether there are positives to take from their elimination from the competition. The guys also go in-depth on Tottenham's 2-1 victory over Marseille, ask whether Liverpool can lure Jude Bellingham in the Summer, and whether Ansu Fati will start again for Barcelona this weekend.

itunes:subtitle: Juventus positives; drama in the UCL; Bellingham rumors to the Prem
